TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 889
TEI.2.document_title: J M Lopez to James Bowie, 11-16-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. M. Lopez to James Bowie. November 16, 1832. Receipt for $74, 5 reales, value of was on and other supplies for the Twelfth Battalion, (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 889

div1.p: J. M. Lopez to James Bowie. November 16, 1832. Receipt for $74, 5 reales, value of was on and other supplies for the Twelfth Battalion, (Omitted.)
